message: On line 22 in epio upload.py should the flags for cp be "-RL" instead of just -R? We currently use symbolic links for some of our settings files so we can share them in a dropbox share. Either way this might be useful.
@glenbot Main issue there is that some people might be using internal symlinks, and not want them dereferenced...
I see. Could it be optional with a flag like "--follow-links" ?
@glenbot Perhaps, or an environment variable (which is nicer, as you can set it once in your .bashrc and have it always apply)
